package.name: ChainPay
package.summary: Enable ChainPay to accept Bitcoin on your Magento platform. Pay less to receive your payments.
package.description:
ChainPay allows your Magento shop to accept Bitcoin as payments for your goods and services.
Bitcoin is a digital currency that millions of customers around the world are using to make payment online. By accepting Bitcoin you are joining hundreds of thousands of businesses in advancing the online payments ecosystem.
After creating a ChainPay account, you can either withdraw your Bitcoin, or configure ChainPay to convert received Bitcoin into your native currency to be paid straight to your bank account.
This means you get a lower charge compared to credit card processing, and your customers do not have to deliver credit card details.
package.notes: Stable release of Bitcoin payment gateway software with ChainPay.
